title: Interpretation of a dream about sweets in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream is one of the desired visions. It is important, interpreted by occult scholars, a praiseworthy and positive interpretation that always foretells the dreamers of goodness and happiness that they will obtain in their lives. We will try to identify some visions of sweets in a dream with the interpretation of these visions. You may also be able to give birth to a child in a dream. This is so that the dreamer can form a general idea of ​​what seeing sweets in a dream means without using these interpretations and applying them to any dream that the dreamer had before reviewing it by a religious scholar. A qualification that can identify every detail about the dreamer and can help him in the correct interpretation of the dream in the form of not making the dreamer follow a wrong interpretation that could cause him problems. The interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream by Ibn Sirin is one of the good visions, as it indicates good luck and abundance of money, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi believes that all the sweets we see in a dream are good except porridge and harissa. Read also: The toilet in a dream. Interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream. Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream symbolizes beautiful ladies in a man’s dream. Also, the dream of eating sweets expresses the coexistence of women, and buying sweets in a dream could be a sign of the nearness of marriage, God willing. God knows best. Just as the dreamer gives sweets to others, this may express the stability that the dreamer enjoys in his emotional and psychological state, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin says that sweets in a dream generally express positive associations, including profit in trade, decent living, or happy news. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream. Seeing sweets in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream for a single girl indicates new relationships. Which a single girl will be able to create, God knows best. Like an unmarried girl who sees candy in a dream, this may be good news for her, God willing, that she will hear the good news soon. The gift of candy in a person’s dream indicates friendliness and love, God knows best. Read also: Penguin in a dream Seeing sweets in A dream for a married woman: A married woman seeing sweets in a dream indicates that this woman enjoys marital happiness and family stability, God willing. God knows best. Also, eating sweets in a married woman’s dream could be a sign of the prosperity that this woman enjoys and a decent life, God willing. Just like a dream about sweets. This promises a married woman the happy news that she will receive, God willing. God knows best. Seeing sweets in a dream for a pregnant woman. When a pregnant woman sees sweets in a dream, this may be good news for her that she will give birth easily and will not suffer from any kind of problems, God willing. God knows best. Such as eating Delicious sweets in a pregnant woman’s dream. This may be a sign that she will give birth to a baby girl, and God knows best. Seeing sweets in a dream for a divorced woman. A divorced woman who sees sweets in a dream, this may be an indication that and

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman’s wedding dress in Ibn Sirin’s dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress for a divorced woman: Seeing a wedding dress in a dream is considered a promising vision of happiness and the arrival of joy, but if it concerns a divorced woman, this may cause her confusion and she thinks a lot about the interpretation of this dream. Does it indicate her second marriage or her return to her ex-husband? The answer to this question varies and includes many different concepts, so if you are interested in this topic and want to learn more, you can take a look at this article. Interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress for a divorced woman. Jurists’ interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress for a divorced woman varies according to its condition in the dream, as we see: It agrees Scientists believe that the interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress for a divorced woman generally indicates in most cases, without specifying its appearance, an improvement in her psychological and material condition. However, if the divorced woman sees that she is wearing an ugly wedding dress and does not like it, this may indicate feelings of sadness and sadness. As for seeing the white dress Dirty material in the dreamer’s dream may indicate deterioration in her health condition and weakness and illness as a result of the deterioration of her psychological state. Interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress by a divorced woman, Ibn Sirin. In his interpretation of seeing a white dress in a divorced woman’s dream, Ibn Sirin mentioned various connotations, such as: Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress portends a woman A divorced woman is good news of compensation and God’s provision for her past life. If a divorced woman dreams that a stranger gives her her wedding dress, this is evidence of his desire to marry her. As for the dreamer who sees her previous wedding dress in a dream, it may reflect her thinking about the past and her inability to get over it, and perhaps The feeling of longing for her ex-husband. Interpretation of a dream about a white dress for divorced women. Al-Nabulsi agrees with Ibn Sirin in interpreting a dream about a white dress for a divorced woman and indicates several meanings, including: If a divorced woman sees that her ex-husband gives her a white dress in a dream, this is clear evidence of his remorse and his desire to end the quarrel between them. Al-Nabulsi interpreted a divorced woman’s dream of wearing a white dress as evidence of positive changes in her coming life, such as forming a cohesive family through marriage to a suitable person of good character. While anyone who sees a dirty white dress in his dream may face some financial or health problems. Interpretation The dream of wearing a wedding dress for divorced women and widowsThere are many different meanings between the dream of wearing a wedding dress in the dream of the divorced woman and the dream of the widow, as is evident from the following points: If the widow sees that she is wearing a beautiful wedding dress, this indicates that she will marry again. When seeing the widow wearing her old wedding dress She is saddened by the death of her husband and cannot forget him. She shows how much he loves her and always remembers his virtues. If a divorced woman is sick and sees in her dream that she is wearing a white wedding dress, this is a sign of near recovery. A clean white wedding dress in a widow’s dream indicates psychological peace, purity of the soul, and the blessing of health and money. However, if a widow sees her deceased husband giving her a white wedding dress and it was dirty and patched in a dream, this may indicate his evil deeds.

title: Interpretation of dreams to see banknotes in a dream for a single woman married to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing banknotes in a dream for a single woman. The dreamer may think that seeing money in a dream is always auspicious, but this is not true. Some of the signs accompanying seeing money in a dream make it one of the disturbing visions whose interpretation is not good. It is known that money is what a person always aspires to possess, so in this article we discuss the interpretation of a dream about seeing paper money in an individual’s dream. Seeing paper money in a dream is not considered a rosy dream, as the most famous interpreters see it as a disturbing vision. Which is often poorly interpreted by the pioneer. Next: Seeing someone in a dream holding a banknote is a sign of the worries and problems that surround him and he is unable to solve them. It also shows the dreamer’s ability to perform Hajj rituals. Paper money in a dream is a sign of the very little money that the dreamer receives from inheritance. Seeing large sums of money indicates that the dreamer will earn a lot of money or will get a job in a prestigious position. The number five on the paper: a reference to the obligatory prayer, so if he sees it completed in the dream, it is an indication of performing all of it, and if it is incomplete, it indicates his shortcomings in performing it. Duties.Interpretation of the dream of collecting banknotes from the ground for single women. The dream interpreters dealt in their books with the single woman’s vision of the paper currency, and mentioned the meanings arising from this dream, and that is why we talk in this paragraph about the interpretation of the dream of collecting banknotes from the ground for unmarried people. As follows: If an unmarried woman dreams that she will pick up banknotes from the ground, this is a sign that she will achieve all the hopes and ambitions that she aspires to achieve. If an unmarried girl is already suffering from financial difficulties, and in a dream she collects money from the ground, this is a sign of It will solve the problems you are facing at the moment. See also: Dream interpretation of seeing banknotes in a dream for a single woman and a married woman in Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams of counting banknotes for single women. Note: If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she is counting a bill, this is a sign of disagreements and problems. Between her and one of her relatives, and she cannot resolve it. For a girl to see in her dream that she is preparing a bank note is a sign of her fears at work due to disagreements with the manager at work. An unmarried woman who sees in a dream a bank note indicates that she is exposed to rumors related to her reputation and that she is suffering from those Who convey bad meanings to her. In general, counting bills for a single girl is a sign that she is dissatisfied with her life and is trying to change it for the better. Interpretation of a dream about seeing banknotes in a dream for a single woman. Dreaming of seeing banknotes in a dream for a single woman, it shows beautiful things that affect the dreamer in Her life, because she did not collect or count it. Therefore, the interpreters say in their interpretations that this dream is one of the most promising visions, and it is as follows: If an undressed girl sees

title: Interpretation of seeing a ring in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a ring in a dream: The ring adorns women with it, and it can be of gold, silver, rubies, or diamonds, and seeing it in a dream indicates marriage to a young man or girl and shows wisdom and prestige. Interpretation of seeing a ring in a dream, whether the vision is for a single, married, pregnant, or divorced woman. And we will present it today through the vision website in which we will discuss the interpretation of seeing a ring in a dream in a dream, in detail in the dream, based on the opinion of major commentators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, al-Nabulsi, Imam al-Sadiq or contemporary translators, so follow us on the vision website. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a vision? A ring in a dream? Seeing gold in a man’s dream indicates loss of money or anger from the sultan. Seeing gold bullion or tree leaves in a dream indicates evil and the evil that befalls the dreamer. Wearing gold and silver for a woman in a dream indicates justice, the fulfillment of desires, and the fulfillment of what is desired. What is the interpretation of seeing a ring in a dream? Dream of a man? If someone sees someone, they give him a ring. Indicates the possession of a rule, a state, or ownership of something that did not exist before, such as a property, a car, a woman, or worldly possession. A dream of a ring being stolen indicates the loss of someone important to the Lord or the death of a loved one. The vision of a young man going to a jewelry store to buy a gold ring in a dream indicates his engagement or marriage. What is the interpretation of seeing a ring in a dream for a single woman? If a girl sees someone giving her a ring studded with diamonds or rubies, this indicates her marriage to a scholar or a prominent figure. A dream. Breaking a ring in a girl’s dream announces the dissolution of the engagement. What is the interpretation of seeing a ring in a dream for a married woman? If a married woman sees her husband giving her a gold ring, this indicates wealth, wealth, and family happiness and may indicate the imminence of pregnancy. Seeing finding gold on the road in a married woman’s dream indicates Improved living conditions and wealth after poverty. Seeing a gold ring or chain being sold. This indicates the loss of a loved one or separation from her husband and may indicate family problems. What is the interpretation of seeing a ring in a pregnant woman’s dream? Seeing a gold ring or chain in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates newborns. Seeing silver in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the birth of a female. Seeing rubies and pearls in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the birth of a son who will have a great interest in knowledge or governance. What is the interpretation of seeing a ring in the dream of a divorced woman and a widow? If he sees a divorced woman and a widow wearing a gold bracelet, it indicates employment. A prestigious position. Or a financial source without effort. If a divorced woman sees that someone gave her a gold ring, it can lead to marriage again, and a diamond ring indicates a man of prestige and knowledge. What is the interpretation of a dream about wearing a diamond ring for a single woman? If an unmarried woman sees that she is wearing a diamond ring It indicates her marriage to a man of status, fame and wealth. Seeing a silver ring in a single woman’s dream indicates her imminent marriage to a man of good morals and religion. What is the interpretation of a dream about wearing a gold ring for a married woman? Seeing a gold ring in a dream for a married woman?

title: Interpretation of seeing a museum in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a dream about a museum in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Sheikh Ibn Shirin said because of the museum in a dream, I mean the huge test in the life of the fortuneteller. It is an indication of an important test in real life, which may be personal or professional. He also said that it symbolizes the troubles and crises that the viewer is exposed to in his professional life. The meaning of the dream of a destroyed museum In a dream: Seeing a destroyed museum in a dream indicates the possibility of falling into a problem. There is no great solution, it is like a warning. The viewer should be careful and careful. Perhaps it is a symbol of the problems that await God in his field of work. The meaning of seeing a large and beautiful museum in a dream. Dreaming of a museum in a dream is a symbol of the transition from one life to another. Better than these in terms of place, status, social and material. It is a symbol of the new stage in the dreamer’s life. As for someone who sees a large museum full of ancient paintings and statues, it is an indication of the viewer acquiring a treasure that may be a large inheritance that will take him from a life of poverty and hardship to extreme wealth. Interpretation of seeing a museum in a dream By Al-OsaimiAl-Osaimi said that a museum in a dream is evidence of a contract. It is the law of contracting parties. It also symbolizes meeting a person of origin and deserving of true friendship. Perhaps it is a symbol of a person who sacrifices for others. The meaning of a dream of walking around a museum. When a man dreams that he visits the museum or walks around it, it indicates the high appreciation of the fortuneteller’s employer. Perhaps An indication of the success of the fortuneteller, if he is a school student. It also indicates success in finding the appropriate job. Whoever dreams that he is walking on a path to a museum, this is a sign of visiting someone who may be close to his heart, a friend or relative. The meaning of a dream about seeing a museum door in a dream. Seeing a museum door in a dream It means the end of a long-term relationship and the beginning of a new one. Whoever sees a statue or merchandise from a museum to his home is a sign of nostalgia for the past and working on the basis of the future. As for whoever watches a museum ticket in a dream, it is a sign of losing money or the appearance of a large expense that was not taken into account. Interpretation of a dream Seeing museum staff in a dream: A dream about designing a museum in a dream symbolizes a hypocrite and a liar. As for the one who watches the museum staff in a dream, it is a sign that the dreamer will be a well-known person as a result of his participation in a well-known group activity such as art, theatre, media, painting, etc. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to the marital status in a comment below the article. We will answer it and explain it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about defecation by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about defecation: It is one of the strange visions that many people see during their sleep, which makes them anxious and curious to know its meanings. This dream carries many signs and clues. It brings good and evil because the vision differs from one person to another, and in this topic we will explain its interpretations from all sides. Follow this article with us. Interpretation of a dream about defecation. The interpretation of a dream about defecation indicates the dreamer’s feeling of psychological peace and calm and he is free of the worries that he was suffering from. If the dreamer sees himself relaxing Himself and does not care about those around him in a dream, this is a sign of his ability to succeed in the affairs of his life. Seeing someone fulfilling his need and not feeling anything in a dream, this is a sign of losing a lot of money. Seeing the dreamer urinating on someone in his dream symbolizes that he does not love the man Whoever sees himself relieving himself in a hidden place in a dream, this is a sign that he spends a lot and spends a lot of money to satisfy his desires. If he urinates in the sea in a dream and is afflicted with a disease, this is one of the good visions for him, because with the Creator, Glory be to Him, there is healing and healing. If the dreamer sees that he is comfortable in the dream, this is a sign that God Almighty will grant him many blessings. Good deeds and blessings. Watching the dreamer relieve himself in a dream means that he gives a lot of alms and does charitable works in reality. Seeing someone who is comfortable, but took a long time in a dream, symbolizes that his trip abroad was delayed due to the appearance of unexpected obstacles before him. Whoever sees himself in a dream He relaxes himself without controlling it and then carries away his waste. This is evidence that he has gained a lot of money through illegal means, and he must stop that immediately lest he receive his reward later. Ibn Shaheen interprets a dream about defecating in water as a sign that the dreamer will lose A lot of money and he may fall into many crises and obstacles. If the dreamer sees that he is comforting himself in front of people in a dream, this is a sign that he has done something forbidden, and he must pay attention to this matter, stop it, and ask for forgiveness so that God Almighty can forgive him. title: Interpretation of dreams about seeing mice in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see mice in a dream, most dreams can be interpreted and interpreted by the person himself, and the reason for this is that the dreamer is the only one who is able to solve the puzzle of his subconscious mind and must connect what is happening to him in reality and what he sees in his dream, taking into account the sleeping conditions that surround him Nightmarish disorders may occur as a result of stress, anxiety, and other reasons. In this article, we explain what the great translators mentioned regarding the interpretation of a dream about seeing mice in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing mice in a dream by Al-Nabulsi: A mouse in a dream is an immoral woman, and it has been reported from the interpretation of a dream about a mouse in a dream that she is a cursed Jew who grieves, or a veiled Jew and a thief, and in another opinion That mouse indicates feeding. We explain the interpretation of the dream of seeing mice in Nabulsi through the following points: Whoever sees in his dream mice leaving his house, his livelihood and the blessings of the household will decrease. As for whoever has a mouse, he has a slave, because the mouse eats what he eats, and the will is on the slave, because he eats What the master eats. And seeing the white mouse and the black mouse shows day and night. See also: Interpretation of dreams about seeing dogs chasing me in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen. Seeing a mouse digging. According to Al-Nabulsi, seeing a mouse digging is a thief wearing a hijab and he must warn the fortuneteller. As for the mouse, it is an evil, corrupt woman, and mice are women, as long as they do that, they are no different. Dreaming of killing a mouse or catching it. In the event that the dreamer sees a mouse killed, the dreamer will win an immoral and immoral woman. And in the event that you see a mouse throwing an arrow or a stone, this indicates that the fortuneteller is pursuing an evil woman. Or he writes to her about prohibited things. In addition to seeing a mouse holding a drawing of a woman. Other information about mice. Anyone who dreams of many fires in a well or a sloping place indicates a decline in his life. Whoever sees mice in his house indicates that there are no good women in his house. Any person He witnesses a beaten rat getting a little money from an immoral woman. Whoever sees a rat coming and going, the dreamer’s life will be long. It is said that white rats are days, while black rats are nights. Likewise, Al-Nabulsi showed the family and children leaving. Interpretation of the dream of seeing mice in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen narrated that seeing a mouse in a dream symbolizes an ugly woman from the inside and outside. A vision of hunting and killing mice. And whoever is seen holding a mouse in his hand and it dies by his hand indicates a calamity for the fortuneteller. In If the dreamer steps on a mouse and kills it, this indicates his separation from an immodest woman. Whoever sees a rat being stoned, slander an immoral woman, and if he shoots an arrow at her, he writes for her. And whoever sees that he catches a mouse with a trap, this indicates his marriage to a cunning woman. Dream of a vision. Mice in the house or on the bed. Whoever sees that his house is full of mice announces the presence of a group in his house. Whoever witnesses the presence of wild rats in his house, and they leave that place, then thieves enter that place and kill them, is a loss for the fortuneteller. And whoever sees a mouse in his bed: it is a woman. Immoral. See also: Dream interpretation of seeing cats in a dream by Ibn Sirin

title: Interpretation of a dream about a flood in Al-Osaimi’s dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a flood in a dream about Al-Asimi. Interpretation of dreams: Flood in a dream. It indicates the good that the dreamer will attain if it does not cause any harm in the dream. If someone sees a red flood in a dream, this indicates problems and crises that the dreamer is going through. Seeing the flood and it was calm means marriage soon. Interpretation of a dream about a flood in a single woman’s dream. Al-Osaimi confirmed that the flood in a dream indicates the goodness and happiness that this girl is experiencing. If a girl sees in a dream that she is escaping from a flood, this indicates her desire to stay away from problems and fears. As for the dream of the flood entering the house without Damage is caused to it, as this indicates abundant livelihood. Interpretation of a dream of a flood in a dream for a married woman: Watching a water storm. Flood. The house in a married woman’s dream is evidence of financial crises occurring within her, especially if they cause the destruction of the house. As for a married woman’s dream of a flood inside the house and causing a lot of damage, this is evidence. To increase the money and happiness that she and her husband experience. Interpretation of a dream about a flood in a dream about a pregnant woman. A flood in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of easy childbirth. A sea flood indicates the approaching date of birth. If a pregnant woman sees a flood and escapes from it, this indicates that she will get rid of problems. Interpretation of a dream about a flood in a man’s dream: A flood in a man’s dream indicates an enemy present in the dreamer’s life. Escaping from a flood in a man’s dream indicates the end of problems and troubles. A dream about preventing a flood in a dream is evidence of getting rid of the crises and problems that the dreamer is in. Floods in general are evidence of living. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to your marital status in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of menstrual pain in a dream

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of menstrual pain in a dream by Ibn Sirin via the Shamloul website. What the dreamer sees depends on his social status. Interpretation of a dream about menstrual pain for unmarried women. Menstrual blood in a dream. A free girl. It indicates the collapse of worries and the elimination of problems. The vision suggests getting rid of the consequences that you face at work. Menstrual pain in a dream indicates the beginning of preparations for marriage. The vision means Achieving goals and getting a new job. The vision is auspicious and the sustenance that an unmarried woman will get soon. Red menstrual blood. This shows in the dream that the girl feels remorse for a sin she has committed and repents before God. Seeing heavy menstrual blood in a dream means that you are thinking a lot about difficult matters. The arrival of menstruation in a dream at an inappropriate time is a sign of adequate nutrition that an unmarried woman will receive. To see menstrual blood in a dream for a married woman To see menstrual blood in a dream for a married woman This indicates the stable life that she lives with her family. The vision indicates the well-being that the woman experiences. The vision symbolizes affection and understanding between family members and her husband’s love for her. The vision expresses the birth of a new woman, and God knows best. Seeing menstrual blood in a dream warns of disagreements and problems that she faces with her husband. To take a menstrual bath in a dream indicates freedom from trouble. It promises menstruation and intercourse. In the dream, it is a sign that you are traveling with your husband to another country for work. The vision heralds the recovery of a woman from the magic that interrupted her life with her husband. See also: - Interpretation of seeing menstrual blood in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about heavy menstrual blood. A lot of menstrual blood that flows in a dream is a sign. However, all planned desires and goals will be achieved. Seeing a lot of blood in a dream symbolizes collecting a lot of money through work. Seeing a lot of contaminated blood in a married woman’s dream warns of problems with her husband that may last for several days. Heavy menstrual blood was red in color, which indicates food. The great seer and progress in life. Interpretation of a dream about the menstrual cycle for a pregnant woman. Look at the menstrual cycle for pregnant women in a dream, foretelling an easy birth and the birth of a healthy child. The release of a large amount of blood in a dream is evidence of the necessity of preserving the health of the fetus so that a miscarriage does not occur, and God knows best. It symbolizes sight. Rules Without Feeling tired in a dream leads to the birth of a male fetus, and God knows best. The vision promises achieving a lot of profits and saving all birth expenses. The symbol of menstruation in a dream is good news. Menstruation in a dream is good news, especially if the color of the blood is pink, as this indicates that you hear good news. The disappearance of menstrual pain in a dream indicates an exit from sadness and a period of fatigue. Then he announces the vision of menstruation. In a dream, the patient is healed. A vision in a man’s dream promises him the accumulation of profits and an increase in his livelihood. The redness of menstrual blood indicates in the dream repentance and abstention from sins. Interpretation of dreams for a menstruating woman. Menstruating woman in a dream: It symbolizes the end and beginning of problems

title: Interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream. Interpretations of dreaming of sweets according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream Interpretation of a dream about sweets according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Many people see themselves in a dream eating sweets, making them, or distributing them to people they know. Sweets are delicious foods that give energy to the body and there are different tastes and ways to prepare them. In this article, we will show you today the interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream, interpretations of a dream about sweets according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Interpretation of dreams about seeing sweetness in a dream, Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. The scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says: If A man saw candy in a dream, so this is a vision that shows a beautiful woman. Seeing eating sweets in a dream means that the dreamer will marry a woman of extraordinary beauty. Watching buying candy in a dream indicates the approaching date of the dreamer’s wedding. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is giving candy to others, then this A good vision portends the stability of his circumstances, and this vision also shows the good psychological state that the dreamer has. In general, seeing sweets in a dream brings praiseworthy things to the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets in a dream for a single womanIf a single girl sees in her dream that she is eating sweets, this is a sign That she will meet new people and create new relationships. Seeing sweets in a dream for a single girl means hearing news that satisfies her heart in the near future, and the arrival of pleasant and joyful events. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is offering sweets to others, this is a sign that the dreamer will live a period Of psychological stability, carrying feelings of love and affection towards people. Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is eating sweets, this is a good vision that portends a great livelihood in the near future. Seeing sweets in a dream for a married woman indicates the arrival of pleasant events that will bring Joy to her home. Interpretation scholars say: Seeing candy in a married woman’s dream indicates the stability of her married life. Interpretation of a dream about eating candy in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees candy in her dream, this is a good vision that portends an easy and trouble-free birth. If a married woman sees in Her dream is that she is eating sweets, this is good news that God will give birth to a female. Interpretation of a dream about seeing sweets for a divorced woman. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing a divorced woman eating sweets in a dream is a dream that people are led to believe in. This vision indicates that the dreamer’s circumstances will change for the better and he will live a stable and calm life. If she sees If a married woman buys sweets and eats them and they taste delicious, this is a sign that she knows a man who wants to marry her and will always try to compensate her for what she suffered in her life. Interpretation of a dream about buying sweets in a dream If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is buying sweets, this is a good vision that promises him that he will obtain a great livelihood. In the near future. Seeing buying sweets in a dream means a happy and trouble-free life, the occurrence of pleasant events and hearing happy news. Interpretation of a dream about seeing gifts of sweets in a dream: If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is buying sweets and then offering them to
